subject: Sports Injuries
Italian Open (Tennis)
Tennis
lead_paragraph: Novak Djokovic returned from a right wrist injury with a 6-3, 7-5 victory over Radek Stepanek in the second round of the Italian Open in Rome.
snippet: Novak Djokovic returned from a right wrist injury with a 6-3, 7-5 victory over Radek Stepanek in the second round of the Italian Open in Rome.
